value.title: Accountants best placed to lead ethical AI use: CA ANZ, ACCA
value.excerpt: As trusted advisers with a high professional regard for ethics, accountants should be tasked with leading the charge on the ethical adoption of artificial intelligence, peak bodies say.

value.title: 15 AI Ethics Leaders Showing The World The Way Of The Future

value.title: The Fallacy Of Fintech Ethics: Could Fintechs Be Less Ethical Than Banks?
value.excerpt: There’s a misguided notion permeating the banking industry that fintech startups are somehow more ethical than banks. They're not—and their reliance on this trope is going to backfire on fintechs.

value.title: Ireland joins €3m European ethical AI postgraduate education effort

value.title: Intel & Dell Technologies Make Acquiring AI Skills More Accessible

value.title: What a career in AI has to offer in the 2020s
value.excerpt: It found that 39% of people thought the path to AI careers was unclear, and one in eight (12%) had no idea about it. Women were more likely than men to lack clarity, as were younger people and undergraduate students versus those studying for master’s and PhDs.

value.title: Intel expands AI career education program to 18 community colleges

value.title: Navigating Religion, Faith, And Creativity In The Age Of AI
